documents.document: That time of day where you really have to go pee, but getting off the couch seems like a lot of effort. Stupid bodily functions
Why does my body hate me so? What did I ever do to it to make it so mad? Besides a super physical job... and all the other dumb stuff I do..

The beast decided to tear its ugly head again as soon as I got to work this morning. Nearly passed out in the bathroom. Guess I get to look forward to a sick meeting soon.
I made it to the shower! I actually put on clothes. It’s a christmas miracle.

Do I have a fever? Is this happening? I don’t want it to happen. Quick, does anyone have a cowbell? I’ll take anything to not feel like death while solo parenting.
My son has written a story. The evil character is named Crackman. “He makes cracks”. Having a hard time not laughing right in his face.

RT @snotnboogers23: Welcome to parenthood.
Your entire house becoming one huge laundry basket is your life now. Have fun.

I JUST SAW SHIRLEY MCLEAN IN DOWNTOWN VANCOUVER!!!!
Shoulder taping so itchy.Must. Leave. On.

It’s as though work is out to get me. I’ve smashed my head on the monitor every time I’ve gone near it tonight. Ow.
The braid/ ponytail night shift combo is doing a fine job of pulling just enough to be uncomfortable. Taking it out in the morning when I go to bed is going to be amazing.

Hey @RogersHelps just got to Australia to discover that my iPhone is locked. I bought it outright a year and a half ago and it was supposed to be unlocked. New SIM card won’t work. Fix this for me?

When your flight is 1 1/2 hrs late leaving already, and they say they have to return to the gate 😭

Ah, international travel with children. Lesson learned: when you ask your 12 yo if they took all the food out of their backpack, know that they lied when they said yes. And know that it’s rotten. And know that security will flag them.

Boy child’s classmate is also at the strings concert, and it would appear that he is smitten. Keeps looking over at her with a dopey grin. So it begins.
Shout out to the mom wearing earplugs at the kids strings Christmas concert. I applaud your quest for self-preservation.

Dear Telus Guy, yes not everyone can be a nurse, yes night shifts are hard, yes I do like my job... can you please stop talking to me now as I am Post night shift and I’m staying awake because you’re in my house

When you’re walking past condos towards work and hear a man grunting. Don’t know if it’s heart attack noises or sex noises, but either way I don’t want to have to deal with it
